00018 #include "../boost/xint/xint.hpp"

00020 namespace boost {
00021 namespace xint {
00022 
00023 namespace core {
00024 integer sqrt(const integer& n) {
00025     if (n.sign() < 0) throw cannot_represent("library cannot represent "
00026         "imaginary values (tried to take sqrt of negative number)");
00027     if (n.sign() == 0) return integer::zero();
00028 
00029     // Initial guess is half the length of n, in bits
00030     integer guess;
00031     setbit(guess, log2(n)/2);
00032 
00033     // Now refine it until we're as close as integers can get
00034     while (1) {
00035         integer guess2=(guess + (n/guess)) >> 1;
00036         if (guess == guess2) break;
00037         guess=guess2;
00038     }
00039 
00040     return guess;
00041 }
00042 } // namespace core
00043 
00054 integer sqrt(const integer& n) {
00055     try {
00056         return integer(sqrt(core::integer(n)));
00057     } catch (std::exception&) {
00058         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00059         return integer::nan();
00060     }
00061 }
00062 
00063 } // namespace xint
00064 } // namespace boost
